author: markt
msg: Remove setParentClassLoader() as it could result in odd behaviour if the class loader is constructed with one parent and then this method is called to change the parent. This class will have visibility of the new parent but any code inherited from the super class will still see the old parent.

author: cziegeler
msg: Use constant instead - we rely on latest API now anyway

author: coheigea
msg: Use a default Crypto instance in X509Security if required
